metadata.title: CVE-2017-6966 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: readelf in GNU Binutils 2.28 has a use-after-free (specificallyread-after-free) error while processing multiple, relocated sections in anMSP430 binary. This is caused by mishandling of an invalid symbol index,and mishandling of state across invocations.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
